602460.name: Wildilfe Park 3 - Alaska
602460.description:
Welcome to Alaska - one of the last wildlife reserves of legendary animal species!

Alaska stretches from the Pacific to the Arctic Ocean and the Bering Sea to Canada over an area of 1.717.854 km². The vegetation zones ranging from coastal rain forests of to Arctic tundra. Large parts of Alaska are designated as protected areas. In addition to the eight national parks, there are five national monuments, 16 national wildlife refuge and several other protected areas.

Alaska features
  • 11 alaska species: moose, wolve, arcticfox, lynx, blackbear, caribou, blacktaileddeer, riverotter, snowshoehare, mountaingoat and dallsheep

  • 6 marine species: orca, humpbackwhale, narwhale, beluga, kingcrab and whitesideddolphin

  • 4 theme park attractions in alaska-style, e.g. the "Yukon Rafting", "Bob Challenge" and "Pit Descent"

  • 7 service facilities like Hotpunchbooth, Marshmallowbooth, Salmongrill, InfoGlu and Stampeders Souvenir with different wood variations

  • 10 decorative objects with variations like signs, watertower, golddigger tools, snow and wood carvings, gold nuggets, etc.
602460.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 简体中文, 波兰语, 捷克语
